price: 25.Nabiyow qaranwaa kee baaxó gintem iyyaay axcuk ken essertek, diggah Yalli ken giné axcelon, amah teelemeenimih Yallah faylá dabaqtay keenik ixxic, tónna hinnay keenik maggo mari qibaadá cakkisittam Yalla kinnim mayaaxigan.
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna al-lahu quli al-ḥamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna
